name: t06_recursion_inline
description: Recursive algorithms and tiny leaf functions that GCC inlines at O1+. Forces oracle_dwarf to handle DW_AT_inline / DW_TAG_inlined_subroutine and detect vanished frames.
oracle_pressure: Small leaf functions (abs_val, max2, min2) get inlined at O1+ leaving DW_TAG_inlined_subroutine entries. Recursive functions may have tail-call optimization at O2+ eliminating stack frames.
